issues.description: The problem statement specifies that calculateTotalPrice should return a double ("with double precision") but in SealSaloon.java the method is declared to return an int. This mismatch prevents students from implementing the intended API and calculating prices with the required precision.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the return type of calculateTotalPrice to double in SealSaloon and use a double accumulator for summing ingredient prices to meet the specification.
